remarks: If the Hom-set operation is a function it is equal to the corresponding functionalized Hom-set operation.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2020.)
statement:
fnhomeqhomf.f $e |- F = ( Homf ` C ) $.
fnhomeqhomf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
fnhomeqhomf.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
fnhomeqhomf $p |- ( H Fn ( B X. B ) -> F = H ) $.
